SurfaceFactory Class Reference
[Helper classes for User Interface classes]

#include <4DView.H>

Public Member Functions

virtual Surface * createSurface (C4DView *)=0

Detailed Description

Abstract base class for a factory creating Surface's.

Separate classes are needed for Functions and Surfaces, because their constructors differ.
